thread.title: Southwest Airlines offers winter fares starting at $49
thread.title_full: Southwest Airlines offers winter fares starting at $49

author: Doreen Christensen
title: Southwest Airlines offers winter fares starting at $49
text:
Southwest Airlines offers winter fares starting at $49 Southwest Airlines airfare sale runs through July 16. Doreen Christensen Contact Reporter Sun Sentinel 
Southwest Airlines is having a winter sale, offering one-way flights as low as $49. 
Book flights for departure from Florida on Tuesdays and Wednesdays from Fort Lauderdale, West Palm Beach and Orlando for travel on Dec. 2-16 or Jan. 5-Feb. 10. 
There are deals departing from 80 other cities as well, including Baltimore and Hartford, Ct. 
For instance, fly from Fort Lauderdale to Tampa for $49 or Washington, D.C. for $69. Go from West Palm Beach for $73 each way. Orlando to Atlanta or Washington, D.C. for $73. 
There are some restrictions. Bonus: Bags fly free. 
Click here for the deal. The sale ends on Thursday, Oct. 15.
